name: Bradley Knowles
text: Quick and easy. Made online order for pickup/carryout and when I checked out it gave me a pickup time. Went through the drive through & got my order. Everything was correct & hot. Couldn't ask for anymore. Good food that's quick and easy.

Salad bar could be better attended to.
